item.title: Ingram Micro outage caused by SafePay ransomware attack
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: An ongoing outage at IT giant Ingram Micro is caused by a SafePay ransomware attack that led to the shutdown of internal systems, BleepingComputer has learned. [...]

item.title: Google's AI video maker Veo 3 is now available via $20 Gemini
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: Google says Veo 3, which is the company's state-of-the-art video generator, is now shipping to everyone using the Gemini app with a $20 subscription. [...]

item.title: ChatGPT Deep Research tests new connectors for more context
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: ChatGPT Deep Research, which is an AI research tool to automate research, is getting support for new connectors (integrations), including Slack. [...]

item.title: Ingram Micro suffers global outage as internal systems inaccessible
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: IT giant Ingram Micro is experiencing a global outage that is impacting its websites and internal systems, with customers concerned that it may be a cyberattack after the company remains silent on the cause of the issues. [...]

item.title: Hacker leaks Telefónica data allegedly stolen in a new breach
item.dc:creator: Ionut Ilascu
item.description: A hacker is threatening to leak 106GB of data allegedly stolen from Spanish telecommunications company Telefónica in a breach that the company did not acknowledge. [...]

item.title: Leaks hint at Operator-like tool in ChatGPT ahead of GPT-5 launch
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: A few new code references in the ChatGPT web app and Android point to an Operator-like tool in GPT's chain of thoughts. [...]

item.title: xAI prepares Grok 4 Code as it plans to take on Claude and Gemini
item.dc:creator: Mayank Parmar
item.description: xAI is preparing the rollout of Grok 4, which replaces Grok 3 as the new state-of-the-art model. [...]

item.title: Police dismantles investment fraud ring stealing €10 million
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: The Spanish police have dismantled a large-scale investment fraud operation based in the country, which has caused cumulative damages exceeding €10 million ($11.8M). [...]

item.title: Grafana releases critical security update for Image Renderer plugin
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Grafana Labs has addressed four Chromium vulnerabilities in critical security updates for the Grafana Image Renderer plugin and Synthetic Monitoring Agent. [...]

item.title: IdeaLab confirms data stolen in ransomware attack last year
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: IdeaLab is notifying individuals impacted by a data breach incident last October when hackers accessed sensitive information. [...]

item.title: Microsoft investigates ongoing SharePoint Online access issues
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​Microsoft is investigating an ongoing incident causing intermittent issues for users attempting to access SharePoint Online sites. [...]

item.title: Microsoft: Exchange Server Subscription Edition now available
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft has announced that the Exchange Server Subscription Edition (SE) is now available to all customers of its enterprise email service. [...]
